CmdLine: apt-get install -y 	wget 	curl 	unzip 	git 	g++ 	make 	&& apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get install -y 	libgl1-mesa-glx 	libglib2.0-0 	&& apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get install -y 	libfontconfig1 	libdbus-1-3 	libx11-xcb1 	libnss3-dev 	libasound2-dev 	libxcomposite1 	libxrandr2 	libxcursor-dev 	libegl1-mesa-dev 	libxi-dev 	libxss-dev 	libxtst6 	libgl1-mesa-dev 	default-jdk 	&& apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -LS https://dl.google.com/android/repository/android-ndk-r16b-linux-x86_64.zip -o android-ndk.zip 	&& unzip -q android-ndk.zip -d /opt/ 	&& rm android-ndk.zip
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -LS https://dl.google.com/android/repository/sdk-tools-linux-3859397.zip -o android-tools.zip 	&& mkdir -p /opt/android/sdk/ 	&& unzip -q android-tools.zip -d /opt/android/sdk/ 	&& rm android-tools.zip 	&& cd /opt/android/sdk/tools/bin && yes | ./sdkmanager --licenses 	&& ./sdkmanager "platform-tools" "platforms;android-25" "build-tools;25.0.3" 	&& yes | ./sdkmanager --licenses
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get install -y 	libgl1-mesa-glx 	libglib2.0-0 	&& apt-get clean
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: curl -LS http://download.qt.io/official_releases/qt/5.9/5.9.3/qt-opensource-linux-x64-5.9.3.run -o qt-install.run 	&& chmod +x qt-install.run 	&& ./qt-install.run --script qt-install.qs --platform minimal -v 	&& rm qt-install.run
Commands.Name: run
